sect1.title: Creating the halt script
sect1.para: Create the /etc/init.d/halt script by running the following command:

para.screen:
cat > /etc/init.d/halt << "EOF" #!/bin/sh # Begin /etc/init.d/halt
# # Call halt. See man halt for the meaning of the parameters #
/sbin/halt -d -f -i -p
# End /etc/init.d/halt EOF
